LanguageData.Tallow.label: tallow
LanguageData.Tallow.description: Pure non-edible fat that can be used to fuel simple buildings that don't require high burning temperature.
LanguageData.Chemfuel.label: chemfuel
LanguageData.Chemfuel.description: A volatile liquid chemical. Used to fuel engines and rockets, or to transmute into propellant for projectiles, or as an incendiary weapon.
LanguageData.Powder.label: Gunpowder
LanguageData.Powder.description: Gunpowder, also known as black powder, is the earliest known chemical explosive. It is a mixture of Sulfur, Coal Ore and Nitre. The Sulfur and Coal Ore act as fuels, and the Nitre is an oxidizer.
LanguageData.Napalm.label: Napalm
LanguageData.Napalm.description: Napalm is flammable liquid used in warfare. It is a mixture of a gelling agent and petroleum or a similar fuel.
LanguageData.Prometheum.label: Prometheum
LanguageData.Prometheum.description: Military-grade incendiary agent, ignites on contact with oxygen. The raw resource is used to craft incendiary ammo of all kinds.
LanguageData.FSX.label: FSX
LanguageData.FSX.description: High-explosive chemical extracted from Boomalope sacks, it is used in a variety of industrial and military applications.
